section.title: Configuration overview
section.para: Security descriptors are mechanisms used to configure authorization mechanism and policy. The authorization on the server side can be configured at the container, service or resource level.
On the client side, authorization can be configured using security descriptors or as a property on the stub. This configuration can be done on a per invocation granularity
